lead_paragraph: Sunrise Christian Academy in Wichita, Kan., attracts many elite basketball players, especially from the Bahamas, the home of Buddy Hield of Oklahoma.

headline.print_headline: Cultivating Bahamian Talent on the Plains
headline.main: For Buddy Hield and Other Bahamians, Talent Is Cultivated on the Great Plains

snippet: Sunrise Christian Academy in Wichita, Kan., attracts many elite basketball players, especially from the Bahamas, the home of Buddy Hield of Oklahoma.
abstract: Profile of Michigan State men's basketball guard Buddy Hield, who has become face of college basketball; Hield points to his time at Sunrise Christian Academy in Wichita, Kan, as integral to his success; academy has three nationally competitive basketball teams, and has become a pipeline for players who hail from Bahamas, like Hield.
